ACTIONS.LABEL: Actions
ACTIONS.TOOLTIP: Actions for the data of the table row

MESSAGE.OK: The Help Item was created successfully
MESSAGE.NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not created.

DELETE.LABEL: Delete
DELETE.TEXT: Do you want to delete the Help Item with this ID?
DELETE.OPERATOR_TEXT: This Help Item was created by automation. If the application continues to offer this Help Item, it will be restored during the next deployment.

MESSAGE.OK: The Help Item was deleted successfully
MESSAGE.NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not deleted.

MESSAGE.OK: The Help Item was saved successfully
MESSAGE.NOK: An error has occurred. The Help Item was not saved.
An error has occurred. Help Items were not exported.
An error has occurred. Help Items were not imported.

VALIDATION.OK: The file has been checked successfully.
VALIDATION.NOK: An error occurred. The file cannot be imported. Details in Console.

INTERNAL.OPERATOR_MESSAGE: This Help Item was created by automation. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

TOOLTIPS.CREATION_USER: ID of the user of the creation
TOOLTIPS.MODIFICATION_USER: ID of the user of the last change
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set, the Help Item cannot be deleted and all changes will be lost during the next deployment.

SEARCH.SEARCH_TOOLTIP: Search for the Help Items with given criteria

TOOLTIPS.PROPS: Base properties of the Help Item
TOOLTIPS.CONTENT: Titel and Content of the Help Item

TOOLTIPS.ID: Unique ID for a Help Item of the Application.
TOOLTIPS.URL: The final URL that is used when calling and consists of the parts base URL, resource and context.
TOOLTIPS.BASE_URL: Base part of the Help Item URL - the base path to the documentation of the Application
TOOLTIPS.RESOURCE_URL: Path from the base path to the specific page (resource)
TOOLTIPS.OPERATOR: If set then this Help Item was created by automation. All changes will be lost on the next deployment.

HELP_DETAIL.URL.TOOLTIP: The used URL to Help page, consists of the parts base URL, resource and context.

MISSING_BASE_URL.CONTENT: A help article has been defined for this page but the base URL is missing.
MISSING_BASE_URL.ITEM_HINT: Die Hilfeartikel ID f√ºr die Seite ist:

NO_HELP_ITEM.CONTENT: No Help Item has been defined for this page.
NO_HELP_ITEM.ITEM_HINT: The Help Item ID for this page is:

HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.LABEL: Edit Help Item for this page
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.TOOLTIP: Edit Help Item for this page
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.OPEN_HELP_PAGE_EDITOR_ERROR: Cannot edit the Help Item. Help Item ID or Application Name missing.
HELP_ITEM_EDITOR.SAVE_ERROR: Form is not valid. Cannot update the Help Item.

ERRORS.HELP_ITEM.MERGE_ENTITY_FAILED: A Help Item with this ID already exists for the Application.
ERRORS.HELP_ITEM.OPTIMISTIC_LOCK: Help Item was updated or deleted in the meantime.
ERRORS.HELP_ITEM.FORM_INVALID: The Help Item form is invalid. The Help Item cannot be saved this way.
ERRORS.PATTERN_ERROR: Your input does not match the required pattern

HTTP_STATUS_undefined.HELP_ITEM: Unknown problem retrieving Help Item data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_undefined.ASSIGNMENTS: Unknown problem retrieving Applications with assigned Announcements - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_0.HELP_ITEM: Unknown problem retrieving Help Item data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_0.ASSIGNMENTS: Unknown problem retrieving Applications with assigned Announcements - please try again.

HTTP_STATUS_400.HELP_ITEM: Your request could not be processed.
HTTP_STATUS_400.ASSIGNMENTS: Your request could not be processed.

HTTP_STATUS_401.HELP_ITEM: You are not authorized to see Help Items.
HTTP_STATUS_401.ASSIGNMENTS: You are not authorized to see Applications with assigned Announcements.

HTTP_STATUS_403.HELP_ITEM: You have no permissions to see Help Items.
HTTP_STATUS_403.ASSIGNMENTS: You have no permissions to see Applications with assigned Announcements.

HTTP_STATUS_404.HELP_ITEM: No Help Items could be found.
HTTP_STATUS_404.ASSIGNMENTS: No Applications with assigned Announcements could be loaded.

HTTP_STATUS_500.HELP_ITEM: Unknown server problem retrieving Help Item data - please try again.
HTTP_STATUS_500.ASSIGNMENTS: Unknown server problem retrieving Applications with assigned Announcements - please try again.
